description: Advances from a small village to a bustling town, ready to expand rapidly. This is the Spartan town phase, where Infantry cost 10% less metal but take 5% longer to train.
tooltip: Advance to Town Phase, which unlocks more entities and technologies. Civic Centers +25% territory influence radius, 25% more garrison capacity and +5 range. Structures +5 capture points regeneration rate per garrisoned unit. All Citizens 10% more health.  Infantry cost 10% less metal and gain .5 hack and 1.0 pierce armor but infantry spearman take 15% longer to train
